overview: Bei Xiaobei is a self-abased writer because he feels himself too fat. Because of his poor appearance, he often ran into a wall in real life. Later, he unwittingly finds a long dusty family tree and accidentally crosses through the ages to meet with his ancestors.

production_companies.name: 北京一个文化传媒有限公司
北京德云社文化传播有限公司
华策影业（天津）有限公司

title: The Faces of My Gene
